definitions.definition: The one who is ordained by God to lead the people of Israel , believed by Christians and Muslims to be Jesus Christ .
A similar religious figure or awaited divine ruler, such as the Islamic Mahdi .
An extremely powerful or revered figure.

main_definition: ( Abrahamism ) The one who is ordained by God to lead the people of Israel , believed by Christians and Muslims to be Jesus Christ .
secondary_definitions: ( religion , loosely ) A similar religious figure or awaited divine ruler, such as the Islamic Mahdi .
( figuratively ) An extremely powerful or revered figure.
